shortdesc.p: Recreational Sports at Virginia Tech offers a multitude of opportunites for students, faculty, and staff. Rec Sports offers group exercise, personal training, intramural sports, club sports, Venture Out, and so much more! Through Rec Sports, you can develop healthy lifestyles, friendships, and leadership skills through fun and competitive activity.

topic.title: How to Pay and Sign Up for Group Fitness Classes
How to Sign Up for Personal Training Sessions

shortdesc.p: If you have decided that you want to participate in personal training, follow these steps to sign up and pay for the sessions you want.

If you want information about your current fitness level before you begin training, you can take part in a fitness assessment. A fitness assessment will help you develop an exercise plan as well as identify any health problems you may encounter during exercise.

topic.title: How to Register and Prepare for a Fitness Assessment

shortdesc.p: If you have decided to complete a fitness assessment, you need to first register and pay online. There are also a few things you should keep in mind when preparing for your fitness assessment.

One of the best ways to get involved on campus is to join an intramural sports team. Whether you are an athletic junkie, missing high school sports, or want a way to meet friends, intramural sports are calling your name!

topic.title: How to Sign Up for Intramural Sports
